allActivatedMessage.message: All extensions has been activated, please restart your Firefox!

allDeactivatedMessage.message: All extensions has been deactivated, please restart your Firefox!

executeActionMessage.message: Action has been exectued, please restart your Firefox!

extensions_MAD_ChrisLE_de_description.message: Multiple Addon Deactivator (M.A.D) is an add-on that can (de)activate one, many or each add-on at the same time.

madToolbarButton_tooltip.message: (De)Activates one, many or all addons at the same time.

restartFirefoxMessage.message: Do you really want to restart Firefox?
